subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Phil Rizzuto was a survivor, reinventing himself after the Yankees dared to dismiss him on Old-Timers’ Day in 1956, turning his smoldering pride into a domination of the booth.
snippet: Phil Rizzuto was a survivor, reinventing himself after the Yankees dared to dismiss him on Old-Timers’ Day in 1956, turning his smoldering pride into a domination of the booth.
